name: Raspberry Cotton Candy
description: this one was ok .. still working on this. I am a beginner and made this recipe before i found all this useful info. actually need to try it now that it has steeped awhile Ill let you know
author: llisahere

reviews.text: Pleas stop flooding the board with you un/ tested  do your proper steeping/testing first and post in the fb groups for suggestions for your mixes...  the board is not the place for that ...
